title: [CREATED A CLUB] But cannot Set Tag?
body: Annoyed... because I created a Club Chat for me and my boys and we cannot even have our Club Tag displayed our even Set a Tag because when I click to go into Setting a Tag I simply cannot as there is no link or "Set Club Tag" is not there... any thoughts??

replies.body: If you don't have 5 people, that is normal, but if you have it, i think that is a bug riot can fix.
Ive found this problem as well, i have 6 people in my club and cannot locate the create tag button
you need 5 members before you can set a tag
